Liftover pipeline¶

Author:Andreas Heger
Release:$Id: pipeline_liftover.py 2900 2010-04-13 14:38:00Z andreas $
Date:April 02, 2014
Tags:Python

The liftover pipeline maps a set of intervals from one or more genomes to a target genome. It uses the liftover tool from UCSC.

Overview¶

Usage¶

See Setting up a pipeline and Running a pipeline on general information how to use CGAT pipelines.

Configuration¶

The pipeline requires a configured pipeline.ini file.

The sphinxreport report requires a conf.py and sphinxreport.ini file (see Building pipeline reports). To start with, use the files supplied with the Example data.

Input¶

Requirements¶

Pipeline output¶

Example¶

Example data is available at http://www.cgat.org/~andreas/sample_data/pipeline_rnaseq.tgz. To run the example, simply unpack and untar:

wget http://www.cgat.org/~andreas/sample_data/pipeline_rnaseq.tgz
tar -xvzf pipeline_rnaseq.tgz
cd pipeline_rnaseq
python <srcdir>/pipeline_rnaseq.py make full

Note

For the pipeline to run, install the Annotation pipeline as well.

Glossary¶

liftover
ucsc_ tool to convert coordinates between assemblies

Todo

  • make the merging step optional. Currently overlapping intervals are merged.

Code¶

pipeline_liftover.convertGtf2Psl(infile, outfile)¶

convert a gtf to a psl file.

This method only takes features of type ‘exon’ and skips all contigs that are not in the genome sequence (for example the variant human chromosomes).

pipeline_liftover.convertBed2Psl(infile, outfile)¶

convert a bed to a psl file.

pipeline_liftover.mergeTranscripts(infile, outfile)¶

merge transcripts before mapping.

Overlapping transcripts are combined in order to speed up the mapping process.

pipeline_liftover.mapMergedTranscripts(infile, outfile)¶

map transcripts from PSL.

Mapping from PSL is equivalent to first converting to genePred format and using the option -gp.

pipeline_liftover.mapTranscripts(infile, outfile)¶

map transcripts from PSL.

Mapping from PSL is equivalent to first converting to genePred format and using the option -gp.

pipeline_liftover.convertMappedPslToGtf(infile, outfile)¶

convert to gtf for export.

pipeline_liftover.summary(infile, outfile)¶

compute mapping stats.
